attributes.action: Change the law so that military personal are no longer exempted from the employment law of the right to have paternity leave.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Military personal should not be exempted from the right in law to have Paternity leave. The law should be changed.

Fair enough if they are on tour of duty then this is understandable but at any other time they ought to be given paternity leave by law.
